text:
<target name="win-pre-compile" unless="lexer-unmodified">
      <exec executable="c:\bin\javacc.bat" dir="." os="Windows 98">
         <arg value="JavaParser.jj"/>
      </exec>
   </target>

When the above is executed on a Windows system it attempts to execute :

    [exec] c:\bin\javacc.bat JavaParser.jj

and hangs. I know there is no typos in the command as no exceptions are thrown.

I tried using dummy batch file with no contents. The command still hangs.
creator: watjb@home.com
